entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of snow beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the morning and in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 50 km/h gusting to 70 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 28 January 2023
